Package com.blukii.sdk.config

Enum Class DisconnectReason

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<DisconnectReason>
com.blukii.sdk.config.DisconnectReason
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<DisconnectReason>, Constable
public enum DisconnectReason extends Enum<DisconnectReason>
Enum DisconnectReason represents the reasons why a connection has been disconnected
See Also:
  • ConnectionListener.onDisconnected(DisconnectReason)

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Enum

    Enum.EnumDesc<E extends Enum<E>>

  • Enum Constant Summary

    Enum Constants
    Enum Constant
    Description
    AuthenticationFailed
    Connection failed because of unauthorized access
    ConnectionNotAccessibleError
    Connection is established but not accessible by the application.
    Device
    Disconnect triggered by device or because of out of range
    Disconnect
    Disconnect triggered by action Blukii.disconnect()
    FactoryDataReset
    Disconnect triggered by action Blukii.writeSystemReset(int, ResponseListener) with mode=Blukii.SETTING_BLUKII_SYSTEM_RESET_FACTORY_DATA_RESET
    FactoryFlashReset
    Disconnect triggered by action Blukii.writeSystemReset(int, ResponseListener) with mode=Blukii.SETTING_BLUKII_SYSTEM_RESET_FACTORY_FLASH_RESET
    FactoryImageReset
    Disconnect triggered by action Blukii.writeSystemReset(int, ResponseListener) with mode=Blukii.SETTING_BLUKII_SYSTEM_RESET_FACTORY_IMAGE_RESET
    InternalError
    Connection failed because of internal error
    NoBlukii
    Connection failed because device is no blukii device
    Reboot
    Disconnect triggered by action Blukii.writeSystemReset(int, ResponseListener) with mode=Blukii.SETTING_BLUKII_SYSTEM_RESET_REBOOT
    Timeout
    Disconnect triggered by connection timeout (see Blukii.setConnectionTimeout(int))
    WrongBlukiiType
    Connection failed because device type does fit to Blukii class type

    • ConnectionNotAccessibleError

      public static final DisconnectReason ConnectionNotAccessibleError
      Connection is established but not accessible by the application.

      blukii is repairing the connection within the next 10 seconds. For this time the blukii is not accessible.

    • NoBlukii

      public static final DisconnectReason NoBlukii
      Connection failed because device is no blukii device
